name: Weight Loss Plan - Beginner
description: A balanced diet plan designed for beginners looking to lose weight gradually and safely.

name: Muscle Gain Plan - Intermediate
description: High-protein diet plan designed for intermediate fitness enthusiasts looking to build lean muscle mass.

name: Maintenance Plan - Advanced
description: Balanced maintenance plan for advanced athletes to maintain current weight and performance.

name: Cutting Plan - Advanced
description: Aggressive fat loss plan for advanced trainees with precise macro tracking and higher meal frequency.

name: Bulking Plan - Beginner
description: Clean bulk approach for beginners focusing on gradual muscle gain with minimal fat accumulation.

name: Lean Muscle Cut - Intermediate
description: High-protein, low-carb diet plan for intermediate trainees focused on lean muscle preservation while cutting body fat.

name: Shredding Plan - Advanced
description: Advanced fat-burning protocol with precise macro tracking, emphasizing protein preservation during aggressive cut.

name: Body Recomposition - Intermediate
description: Balanced approach for simultaneous fat loss and muscle gain with strategic carb timing and high protein intake.

name: Ketogenic Cutting - Advanced
description: Very low-carb, high-fat ketogenic approach for advanced fat loss while maintaining muscle mass through adequate protein.
